about_the_game:
BarbarQ 2 is a casual adventure game where players form their own island clan, recruit warriors, and search for treasure. On the path to becoming chieftain, players will also embark on adventures and strengthen the clan. Relaxing and enjoyable content, such as 3v3v3 survival, epic stories, clan management, mounts and much more, in this barbaric world.

1. Classic 3v3v3 mode - Devour mushrooms and become Master Evil
Classic 3v3v3 gameplay and mischievous characters are back in BarbarQ 2. From the get-go, players are thrown into the mix with randomly generated abilities in six-minute rounds. Level up and beat Bashroom to become Master Evil and claim victory.

2. Enlist Warriors & increase their rank
Collect and upgrade items to increase your rank. Various warriots are waiting to be unlocked and upgraded. Utilize powerful combos and randomly generated abilities to annihilate the enemy.

3. Protect your Tribe & repel the Bashroom
Players take control of the barbarians that live in Barbarous Land and form their own tribe, while repelling the invading Bashroom and giants. On their journey to become a revered chieftain, players also go on adventures, collect treasure and protect their growing tribe.

4. Customized appearances & warrior development
BarbarQ 2 offers a variety of collectable weapons, mounts and pets for players who want to be unique and steal the show.

5 Develop your Alliance & create a home
Make your home in the village, you will find the Pet Cabin, Mount Yard, Smithy and other buildings. Players can use resources they collect in PvP battles to build and upgrade buildings.
